duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct property and casualty insurance claim investigations, ensuring accurate assessments and fair settlements.
Utilize Xactimate software to estimate property damage and calculate claim payouts.
Provide training to team members on insurance adjusting procedures and software tools.
Communicate with clients, policyholders, and third-party vendors to gather necessary information for claims handling.
Adhere to regulatory requirements and industry standards while processing claims and settlements.
Collaborate with other departments to resolve complex claim issues and provide exceptional customer service.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Insurance, Risk Management, or related field (Certifications such as AIC, CPCU, or ARM are a plus)
